question: This country Cabinet has approved 100% business ownership to foreign investors.
explanation: United Arab Emirates Cabinet has approved a plan to allow foreign investors to own 100% of UAE-based businesses by end of 2018. At present, foreigners generally cannot own more than 49 percent of any UAE firm unless it is incorporated in a special "free zone". The decision is part of a wider change to the system that would grant residency visas of up to 10 years to investors and specialists.
